ISSUE.TITLE: docs: add more example about how to use the router `radixtree-uri`
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: for examples: > eg: 1. different routes with the same values. 2. different routes with the same URI, eg: `/*`. 3. different routes with different URI, eg: `/test/*`, `/*`. help the user to know how to use APISIX
